paper_metadata.title: Strengthening PSNP4 Institutions and Resilience (SPIR) Impact Evaluation

component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: In addition, extremely poor households received a one-time livelihood transfer on an experimental basis, either as cash transfers or in-kind poultry grants

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: In addition, extremely poor households received a one-time livelihood transfer on an experimental basis, either as cash transfers or in-kind poultry grants

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Child stunting, and infant and young child feeding (IYCF) practices and knowledge were the primary and secondary nutrition outcomes evaluated by this cRCT
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Using this data this paper makes two main contributions to the literature on graduation... Results from the cluster randomized control trial (cRCT)

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Implemented at scale, the graduation program provided PSNP beneficiaries with additional livelihood programming including savings groups, business skills training and linkages to financial services
evidence_citations.country_citation: This paper evaluates a graduation program targeting the ultra-poor in Ethiopia
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Implemented at scale, the graduation program provided PSNP beneficiaries with additional livelihood programming | extremely poor households received a one-time livelihood transfer
